name: just remove sylvans from the game already
author: stealth sub

extra.name: Sky Galloping Gaia the Dragon Champion

notes.text:
well, I got KOG which was pretty hard considering I've been working full time for the last month

mainly just because sylvans are frustrating af to fight against, earlier in the season i spent about ~100ish games hard stuck in Legend 1 because I kept fighting dudes who milled 1st turn Harpiefeathergekis off of a Mushroom

Tried geargias today, climbed from Legend 1 to KOG with only 1 loss, which was a DC so I'm gonna go ahead and claim undefeated L1 -> KOG here. This deck crushes everything but Sylvans, but I guess it has a fighting chance against them too.

I don't know if I would change anything, this list is basically optimal imo. A 3rd ties would be good, but the only thing I'd drop for it would be either Chalice (which clutched out many games) or an attacker (which I find 2 is the sweetspot in running, since 3 = dead hands)
